descripcion: A desk is a piece of furniture used for working. It typically has a flat surface for writing, placing a computer, and storing office supplies.
An office chair is designed for comfort and support during long working hours. It often includes adjustable height and wheels for mobility.
A computer is an essential device for work, used for creating documents, sending emails, and accessing the internet.
A printer is a device that produces hard copies of digital documents and images. It is commonly used for reports and presentations.
A filing cabinet is used to organize and store important papers and files in an office.
A whiteboard is a large surface used for writing or drawing with markers during meetings or presentations.
A telephone is used for making voice calls, whether internal to the office or external.
Stationery includes items like pens, pencils, notepads, and staplers that are essential for everyday office tasks.
Proper office lighting is essential for reducing eye strain and creating a comfortable working environment.
A bookshelf is used for storing books, reference materials, or decorative items in an office.
A monitor is a screen used to display information from a computer, essential for visual tasks.
A keyboard is a device used to input text and commands into a computer.
A mouse is a handheld device used to control the cursor and navigate on a computer screen.
A router is a device that connects the office to the internet and allows multiple devices to access the network.
A shredder is a machine used to destroy confidential documents by cutting them into small pieces.
A projector displays images or videos onto a large screen, often used during meetings or presentations.
A conference table is a large table designed for meetings where multiple people can gather.
A trash bin is used to collect waste materials and keep the office clean.
A coffee machine is a common appliance in offices for preparing coffee, helping employees stay energized.
A clock is used to keep track of time in an office, ensuring schedules are followed.
